_instructions: BHL.API_KEY (guid) is used to identify our activity at BHL. Get one at https: //www.biodiversitylibrary.org/getapikey.aspx.
BHL.DB (structure) contains the settings needed to connect directly to the BHL Database.
CACHE.LIFETIME (integer) How many days can pass before we re-fetch somnething from the web.
CACHE.PATHS (structure) Places where we save things. Most of these don't need to be changed.
PATHS.OUTPUT (filesystem path) Where do the PDFs go when they are done?
PATHS.SOURCE (filesystem path) Where can we go instead of the web to get image files? Expects the structure in this folder to be I/Identifier00 (first letter, IA identifier)
IMAGE.RESIZE (float, 0.0 - 1.0) Do we resize the images to make the resulting PDF smaller?
Anything other than 1 will slow down the processing but result in larger files
MQ -- Where is the message queue for PDFs that need updating
